name: Heystack
description:
Heystack is a decentralized chat app built on Stacks. We designed and built it in a couple days as part of our internal hackathon, with the goal to build a showcase project for Stacks.


The Heystack logic code is on chain using smart contracts and the frontend is open source. To chat, you'll spend HEY tokens and you'll receive tokens when others like your chats.
